name: Chris Dietrich
description: Chris has been teaching English for more than 20 years in the classroom and also virtually. He holds a BA in Linguistics and also an ESOL teaching certificate from the University of Maryland Baltimore County. His focus is on job interview preparation and resume/LinkedIn account reviews.

name: Lena Lang
description: Lena Lang is a Canadian business English teacher and communication coach. She helps busy professionals show up confidently in meetings, deliver impactful presentations, and write well-crafted emails so they can build great relationships with their English speaking team members and clients.
